Uses of HBaseClient in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase
 

Classes in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase that implement HBaseClient
 class BoundedHBaseClient
          An HBaseClient that constrains the maximum number of concurrent asynchronous requests.
 class HBaseClientProxy
          Proxies the HBaseClient API to an HBaseClient.
 class InstrumentedHBaseClient
          An HBaseClient that is instrumented with Metrics.
 

Methods in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase that return HBaseClient

          Builds a default HBaseClient instance from the specified HBaseClientConfiguration.

          Builds an HBaseClient instance from the specified HBaseClientConfiguration with the given name.
